```{r}
# run clustering
devtools::load_all("../")
cciaUse("~/cecelia/dev", initConda = FALSE)

# init ccia object
cciaObj <- initCciaObject(
  pID = pID, uID = "Jg3ofZ", versionID = versionID, initReactivity = FALSE # Set
)

exp.info <- cciaObj$summary(withSelf = FALSE, fields = c("Attr"))

uIDs <- names(cciaObj$cciaObjects())
uIDs <- uIDs[uIDs %in% exp.info[exp.info$Organ == "Liver",]$uID]

# run task
funParams <- list(
  uIDs = uIDs,
  regChannel = "Hoechst",
  doFftInitialization = FALSE,
  doAffine2d = TRUE,
  doAffine3d = FALSE,
  ignoreSpacing = TRUE,
  sigma = 1.0,
  autoMask = FALSE,
  samplesPerParameter = 5000,
  expand = 0
)

task <- cciaObj$runTask(
  funName = "cleanupImages.registerImages",
  funParams = funParams,
  envVars = HPC_CONF,
  hpcDir = paste(hpcDir, pID, "ANALYSIS", sep = "/"),
  # env = "hpc",
  env = "local",
  # runInplace = FALSE,
  runInplace = TRUE,
  taskID = 1
)
```

```{r}
# segment
devtools::load_all("../")
cciaUse("~/cecelia/dev", initConda = FALSE)

# init ccia object
cciaObj <- initCciaObject(
  pID = pID, uID = "UEssFo", versionID = versionID, initReactivity = FALSE # Test
)

# run task
funParams <- list(
  valueName = "default",
  models = list(
    "1" = list(
      "model" = "cyto2",
      "matchAs" = "cyto",
      "cellDiameter" = 10,
      "cellChannels" = list("CD20"),
      "normalise" = 0.99,
      "threshold" = 0,
      "relTreshold" = 0,
      "gaussianFilter" = 0,
      "subtractgaussianFilter" = 0,
      "subtractCellDiameter" = 0
    ),
    "2" = list(
      "model" = "cyto2",
      "matchAs" = "nuc",
      "cellDiameter" = 10,
      "cellChannels" = list("Hoechst"),
      "normalise" = 0.99,
      "threshold" = 0,
      "relTreshold" = 0,
      "gaussianFilter" = 0,
      "subtractgaussianFilter" = 0,
      "subtractCellDiameter" = 0
    )
  ),
  clearDepth = FALSE,
  clearTouchingBorder = FALSE,
  haloSize = 0,
  blockSize = -1,
  overlap = -1,
  blockSizeZ = -1,
  overlapZ = -1,
  context = 1,
  segment = TRUE,
  updateMeasures = FALSE,
  saveMeshes = FALSE
)

# run task
task <- cciaObj$runTask(
  funName = "segment.cellpose",
  funParams = funParams,
  envVars = HPC_CONF,
  hpcDir = paste(hpcDir, pID, "ANALYSIS", sep = "/"),
  # env = "hpc",
  env = "local",
  # runInplace = FALSE,
  runInplace = TRUE,
  taskID = 1
)
```
